name: Elemental Escape (Gabe Stott, Sir Jacobious, Liam Peachey, Rob Cole, EOHanlon243)
name_original: Elemental Escape (Gabe Stott, Sir Jacobious, Liam Peachey, Rob Cole, EOHanlon243)
description:
An infinite and procedural endless runner in which you play as a daring axolotl wizard!

Your castle is under siege and you must attempt to escape utilising your mastery of fire and ice magic.

Left click - Fire attack
Right click - Ice attack
Spacebar - Jump
A - Move left
D - Move right

An original game by Hawk Wind Fire Blade
